article.Heading: 28% tax on items like fans & other electronics is too high for common man: Manish Sisodia, Finance Minister of Delhi
article.Body:
In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Shereen Bhan and Bhupendra Chaubey, Manish Sisodia, Finance Minister Delhi spoke about the launch and future of the goods and services tax (GST).

Watch accompanying video for more...
